name: Hebe Jewellery
description: Silver jewellery online shop across UK
overview:
HeBe Jewellery is glamour heaven.

HeBe Jewellery launched in 2002 and is run by Laura Bentley, one of the Midlands youngest jewellery retailers. The shop is a trend-heaven treasure trove of wild, funky and individual designs. Every item is hand-picked for quality and style - from pearls to platinum diamond rings, fire opals to rubies and unsual navajo jewellery.

With a fine selection of award winning engagement and diamond rings, HeBe offers an individual bespoke ring design service for ‘partners’ wedding and engagement rings. The gemstones at Hebe are specially selected for color and clarity. Fabulous opals, emeralds, rubies, aquamarines are there to make your mouth water and keeping to the theme of ‘something special’ there are even rarer gems such as the lovely blue Tanzanites. Hand-picking designer collections takes our jewellery buyers all over the world. Hebe Jewellery specialize in silver jewellery with fabulous Italian collections, Navajo jewellery from America, the best in british designers and contemporary styles from Germany. Charm bracelets are the must have accessory and most popular find is Nomination. Laura first saw this in a boutique close to the Pantheon in Rome. It’s inspired stainless steel links with 18ct gold and gemstones help you remember lifes special moments.
